title: Matador
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A Mexican food grill that will make most things on the menu vegan upon request. Fresh cut veggies (zucchini, squash, bell peppers) are cooked upon request and are included with your meal at no extra cost. Complimentary guacamole on all vegan meals. Different types of salsas are made year-round using seasonal fruits. Staff knows what is vegan, so feel free to ask any questions.
